PERSONA.TITLE: PARIS
PERSONA.DESC: a young nobleman, kinsman to the prince.

PERSONA.TITLE: MONTAGUE
PERSONA.DESC: heads of two houses at variance

PERSONA.TITLE: CAPULET
PERSONA.DESC: heads of two houses at variance

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: heads of two houses at variance with each other.

PERSONA.TITLE: MISC
PERSONA.DESC: An old man, cousin to Capulet.

PERSONA.TITLE: MERCUTIO
PERSONA.DESC: kinsman to the prince, and friend to Romeo.

PERSONA.TITLE: BENVOLIO
PERSONA.DESC: nephew to Montague, and friend to Romeo.

PERSONA.TITLE: MISC
PERSONA.DESC: Page to Paris; another Page; an officer.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: Citizens of Verona; several Men and Women, relations to both houses; Maskers, Guards, Watchmen, and Attendants.
